mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clothes (cID, name, category, subcategory, filter, photo, isFavorite, id) VALUES(#{cId},#{name},#{category}, #{subcategory}, #{filter},#{photo}, #{isFavorite}, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE Clothes SET cId=#{cId}, name=#{name}, category=#{category}, subcategory=#{subcategory}, filter=#{filter}, photo=#{photo}, isFavorite=#{isFavorite} where cId=#{cId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM clothes where name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND id=#{id};
SELECT * FROM clothes where category=#{category} AND subcategory=#{subcategory} AND id=#{id};
SELECT * FROM clothes where isFavorite=true AND id=#{id};
